item.description: Congratulations to the founding of #UNIFOR - a historic moment for the working people of Canada. Yes we are stronger together.

item.title: Mentioned by The Province
item.description:
Layton statue unveiled in Toronto
The city also renamed the terminal for the ferry that links the city to Toronto Island after the popular politician. MP Olivia Chow says the statue of her late husband and the renaming of the ferry terminal were huge honours and would have meant a lot to Layton, ...

item.title: Mentioned by Huffington Post Canada
item.description:
Jack Layton Statue Unveiled On Toronto Waterfront
MP Olivia Chow says the statue and the renaming of the ferry terminal were huge honours and would have meant a lot to her husband, who died Aug. 22, 2011. "Being in this place, the starting place for so many wonderful journeys, brings back a flood of joyous ... NDP Member of Parliament Olivia Chow, left, stands with Toronto Councillor Mike Layton, centre, and Sarah Layton, right, during an event marking the one year anniversary of Federal NDP Leader Jack Layton in Toronto on Wednesday, August 22, 2012.

item.title: Mentioned by Newstalk 1010
item.description:
WATCH: Layton statue unveiled
On the second anniversary of his death, a bronze statue of Layton on a tandem bicycle was unveiled by widow NDP MP Olivia Chow, son Toronto councillor Mike Layton and other family members. There is one empty seat on the statue for anyone who wants ...

item.title: Mentioned by insideTORONTO.com
item.description:
Statue of Jack Layton unveiled during moving ceremony at ferry terminal
MP Olivia Chow (Trinity-Spadina), Layton's widow, made a speech at the event, along with Jack's son, Ward 19 Trinity-Spadina Councillor Mike Layton, Mayor Rob Ford and Ward 28 Toronto Centre-Rosedale Councillor Pam McConnell. “The Toronto island is ...

item.title: Mentioned by Torontoist
item.description:
Late NDP Leader Jack Layton Honoured With a Statue
Toronto sculptor David Pelletier created the statue with design tips from Layton's widow, Trinity-Spadina MP Olivia Chow (who is herself a sculptor), to ensure that the features were accurate. The front seat is open, to encourage people to sit and take photos.

item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca
item.description:
NDP MP Olivia Chow to unveil 'life-size' Jack Layton statue in Toronto
NDP MP Olivia Chow will mark the second anniversary of her husband's passing by unveiling a bronze sculpture to honour the late NDP Leader -- a "life-size" monument of Jack Layton on the back seat of a bicycle built for two that, according to the release, ...
